name: Beechtalk - hide likes on posts
description:
Hides the like (or dislike) count on individual posts on Beechtalk internet forum.

Does not hide the user total lifetime likes count.
additional_info: Personally, I think the like/dislike system is a net benefit to the site and community, but some users seriously object to it. This is intended to allow those users to simply not see the content they object to.
